title: How do I report guys boosting accounts.
body:
These scum of league are going 30 1 and spamming %%%%%%%%%%%% in my games.. 

Ive got screen shots and its blatently obv by their history.

RIOT make it easier for use to report this crap and get it off the servers..

Im so fucking sick of it..

[REMOVED]

replies.body: you could either report in game under unsportsmanlike behaviour, or you could message a riot team member with a bulk of boosters with screenshots of their advertising and match history and you might get a better response like that.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ny7PstOE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-20T07:50:31.658+0000)
>
> you could either report in game under unsportsmanlike behaviour, or you could message a riot team member with a bulk of boosters with screenshots of their advertising and match history and you might get a better response like that.

Yup! And you can send a message to Riot by submitting a ticket to Riot Games Player Support at support.riotgames.com. If you're unsure where the ticket goes, submit it as a General Question. I'm sorry you had this negative experience, and please utilise the in-client report feature when possible.

Cheers!
